vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.33;
son of: Japhlet (H3310);
brother of: Pasach (H6457) and Ashvath (H6220)
§ Bimhal = "in circumcision: in weakness (by mixture)"
a descendant of Asher
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jaflet; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
賓哈 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "割禮之子, 虛弱中 (並含兩種意思)"
亞設的後裔 (代上7:33)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
宾哈 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "割礼之子, 虚弱中 (并含两种意思)"
亚设的后裔 (代上7:33)
